005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.NodeVisitorBase;
010
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015public final class AstCollectingVisitor
016    extends NodeVisitorBase {
017  public static final String EOL = "\n";
018
019  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidStringBufferField") // short lived
020  private final StringBuilder strBuilder;
021  private int indent; // 0;
022
023  private AstCollectingVisitor(@NonNull StringBuilder strBuilder) {
024    this.strBuilder = strBuilder;
025    indent = 0;
026  }
027
028  /**
029   * Generate a string representation of an AST.
030   *
031   * @param node
032   *          the branch of the tree to visualize
033   * @return the string representation of the AST.
034   */
035  @NonNull
036  public static String asString(@NonNull Node node) {
037    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
038    AstCollectingVisitor visitor = new AstCollectingVisitor(builder);
039    visitor.collect(node);
040    return ObjectUtils.notNull(builder.toString());
041  }
042
043  private void appendIndent() {
044    for (int i = 0; i < indent * 2; i++) {
045      strBuilder.append(' ');
046    }
047  }
048
049  private void collect(@NonNull Node node) {
050    visit(node);
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  protected void visit(Node node) {
055    assert node != null;
056    appendIndent();
057    node.astString(strBuilder, true);
058    strBuilder.append(EOL);
059    indent++;
060
061    try {
062      super.visitChildren(node);
063    } finally {
064      indent--;
065    }
066  }
067}
